text.content:
Concussion

Normal damage. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Confused]{Confused} for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} until healed.

Bludgeoning

Infection

The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude] or contract filth fever (Pathfinder Bestiary 258).

Piercing

Flay

Normal damage. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 3} until healed.

Slashing

Corrosive

If this is an acid bomb or spell, the target takes triple damage and @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Acid1d6.success]. Any other bomb or spell deals double damage.

Bomb or Spell
